concept.title: Hide Report Suites
concept.shortdesc: Lets you hide report suites in the Adobe Analytics user interface.

conbody.p: If you do not want a report suite to be available to you and your users any more, you can hide it from view. Hiding a report suite prevents it from being shown in the report suite selector drop-down menu., the Admin Console, or anywhere else that report suites are shown. It makes the report suite's data inaccessible via the Adobe Analytics interfaces until the report suite is unhidden.
conbody.note: Data that is sent to a hidden report suite from your site continues to be collected, processes, and billed.
conbody.p: To hide the report suite, go to Analytics > Admin > Company Settings. Check the Hidden checkbox to the left of the report suite name.
To unhide the report suite, uncheck the Hidden checkbox.
To view only hidden report suites under Company Settings, select View > Only Hidden Report Suites.
To view only visible report suites, select View > Only Visible Report Suites.
